name: DrummingVR
description: Create and organize your drum set the way you want with this great game, practice your drumming skills or even learn the drums with this!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and up Processor: Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 960 Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and up Processor: Quad Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 Storage: 600 MB available space
